info.name: dim_brighten_rate_01
info.description: Using 6 dim fixtures and 1 CCT fixture to test a rim and brighten rates. Using multiple sources of input such as override, occupancy/vacancy, dimmer, daylight, and scenes. Will also be verifying the set and clear virtual time setting to verify it works as expected.

exec: tests["Status code is 200"] = responseCode.code === 200;
